800*600mm 2 Digits Tri-color Countdown Timer

Application – mainly used at large junctions with multiple lanes to countdown remaining time of each phase
LED quantity – Red 546, Yellow 294, Green 336
Life span of LEDs – More than 80,000 hours,Power consumption – ≤ 14W

200mm Clear Lens RYG Arrow Traffic Light

Application – mainly used at crossroads to provide vehicle signalling
LED quantity:Red:36 Yellow:36 Green:36
Life span of LEDs: More than 80,000 hours
Power consumption:≤ 6W
Housing material:Polycarbonate,UV resistant
Housing color:black
